title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ: ITPUI:WIN2000, which involves opening a scripted resource editor example on XML files, the following issue occurs:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called test.xml.
3. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
4. Choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'.
5. Nothing happens; the scripted resource editor example is reactivated instead of opening the file with the chosen text editor.

It should be noted that searching for an existing open file should also consider the editor types used, and it should open a new editor on the file when the editor type is different.
EB:
When following the steps in 1GEWMOZ: ITPUI:WIN2000, which involves opening a scripted resource editor example on XML files, the following expected behavior should occur:
1. Create a new basic project.
2. Create a new file called test.xml.
3. Select test.xml in the Navigator.
4. Choose 'Open With...' and select 'Default Text Editor'.
5. A new editor should open the file with the chosen text editor, instead of reactivating the scripted resource editor example.

It should be noted that when searching for an existing open file, it should consider the editor types used. If the editor type is different, it should open a new editor on the file.
